descriptor.name: Operation Silver Talon
descriptor.bio:
A military operation involving the extraction of an asset and requisition of funds. txt ---

Subject: Operation Silver Talon - Asset Extraction

Local Asset "Viper" (identified as Captain Elena Rossi of the Crimson Vanguard) has completed the requisition of 12,000 Credits from the vault at Outpost Zeta.

descriptor.name: High Command
descriptor.bio: The supreme military authority that issued the coded order for the operation. Rossi initiated the transfer following a coded order from High Command.
